‚úÖ Please review the content and let us know if you‚Äôd like any changes to the article publishing automation.

## üöÄ Automation Summary

### üîπ What does this automation do?
This automation takes care of the entire blog publishing process automatically.
You don‚Äôt have to manually research, write, design, or post content. Instead:

You just add or approve a blog topic in Google Sheets.
The system will then research the topic, write the blog, create an image, publish it on WordPress, update the sheet, and notify your team ‚Äì all without any manual effort.

### üîπ How does it work step by step?
**Start ‚Äì** The workflow runs on a schedule (like every morning) or whenever you trigger it manually.

**Read Topics from Google Sheets ‚Äì** It looks at your content sheet and picks only those topics that are approved and still pending to be published.

**AI Research & Content Writing -**
Google Gemini (AI) does in-depth research on the topic and target keyword.
Then it writes a full 800‚Äì1000 word article in clear, simple language with SEO optimization.

**Quality Check & Fixes: -**
The blog draft is checked to make sure it sounds natural, human-friendly, and well-written. Any grammar, flow, or readability issues are automatically improved.

**Image Creation ‚Äì**
An image prompt is created based on the blog title and content.
The prompt is sent to Ideogram AI, which generates a realistic and professional blog cover image.

**Publish to WordPress ‚Äì**
The article and image are uploaded directly to your WordPress site.
The image is set as the blog‚Äôs featured image, so the post looks complete and professional.

**Update & Notify ‚Äì**
The blog‚Äôs live link is saved back into your Google Sheet.
A notification is sent to your team on Discord with the new blog link, so everyone knows it‚Äôs published.

### üîπ Which APIs power this workflow?
**Google Sheets API ‚Üí** To read topics and update status.
**Google Gemini API ‚Üí** For research and blog writing.
**OpenAI API ‚Üí** To create creative image prompts.
**Ideogram API ‚Üí** To generate professional blog images.
**WordPress REST API ‚Üí** To publish content and images.
**Discord API ‚Üí** To notify the team automatically.

### üîπ Why is this useful?
Saves hours of manual work (research, writing, image design, posting).
Ensures blogs are always SEO-optimized and published on time.
Keeps everything organized in Google Sheets.
Keeps the team updated instantly after publishing.

### üëâ In short: Approve a topic in Google Sheets ‚Üí The automation handles everything else from research to publishing.

### üü° Get the Client Data:
"Fetches client data from Google Sheet (Auth Code, Website URL, SEO Sheet, Frequency, etc.). Only picks rows where Project Status = Active and Blog Publishing = Automation."

### üü° Check Blog Publishing Status:
"Checks the client‚Äôs publishing schedule. If Weekly Frequency matches the current day or is set to Daily, the workflow continues; otherwise, it stops."

### üü° Fetch Pending Topics from Content Req & Posting:
"Reads the client‚Äôs sheet and selects only those topics where status is Approved and Live Link is still Pending, meaning they are ready for publishing."

### üü° If condition:
"Checks whether the selected topic has a Focus Keyword; if empty the process stops, if not empty the workflow continues to content creation."

### üü° Pass 1 Blog Topic:
"Keeps only the first blog topic from the list so that the workflow processes one topic at a time."

### üü° Do the Research on the Topic:
"Generates an in-depth research report for the given keyword and topic, covering search intent, top competitors, content gaps, audience profile, trending subtopics, related keywords, and a suggested SEO-friendly blog outline."

### üü° Write the Content:
"Creates a complete 800‚Äì1000 word blog article in clean HTML format, written in a simple and conversational style, naturally integrating keywords, adding internal links, and ensuring readability for the target audience."

### üü° Check Content Quality:
"Analyzes the generated blog to ensure it reads like human-written content by checking tone, conversational flow, readability, sentence clarity, empathy, active voice usage, and overall engagement, then produces feedback on what to improve."

### üü° Fix the Quality Issues:
"Takes the feedback from the quality check and improves the content by correcting grammar, punctuation, sentence flow, and readability issues while keeping the same HTML format, structure, and overall meaning of the blog intact."

### üü° Extract Blog Title:
"Processes the AI-generated HTML content to extract the main <h1> title separately and remove it from the body text, ensuring the blog title and content are clean and distinct."

### üü° Prepare Final Data:
"Collects all required fields (S. No, Blog Title, Content, Auth Code, Website URL, and OnPage SEO) into a structured format, preparing the data for final publishing to the correct WordPress site."

### üü° Sticky Note for Generate Image Prompt:
"Generates a clean and professional AI image prompt from the blog title and content‚Äîkeeping it realistic, minimal, and visually engaging for use in blog cover images."

### üü° Image Generate:
"This node connects to the Ideogram AI API and submits the blog‚Äôs tailored image prompt with fixed quality, resolution, and count settings, generating a polished blog visual and returning its direct URL for the next steps."

### üü° Download Image in Binary File:
"This node takes the image URL produced by Ideogram, downloads the file, and converts it into binary format, making the image immediately usable for storage, sharing, or publishing on WordPress."

### üü° Upload Image in WordPress:
"Uploads the generated blog image into the WordPress media library using REST API, assigns it a filename from the blog title, and returns a unique media ID for use in the post."

### üü° Publish Blog on WordPress:
"Creates and publishes a new WordPress post with the blog title, content, and embedded uploaded image, returning the post ID for further updates."

### üü° Set Image as Featured Image:
"Updates the published blog post to assign the uploaded image as the featured thumbnail, ensuring the blog appears with a proper cover image on the website."

### üü° Update row in sheet:
"Finds the correct row in the Google Sheet using s. no. and updates it with the blog‚Äôs Live Link, keeping the publishing tracker accurate and up-to-date."

### üü° Send a message (Discord):
"Sends an automated notification to the project‚Äôs Discord channel, tagging the responsible person and sharing the live blog link so the team can review it immediately."
